Watching The Bighorns



The tourists are surprisingly tame, and can be approached quite closely by a bighorn before shying off.
Taken Thursday, August 20, 2009, 09:23:07AM. Original image size: 3888x2592, 2.4Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/60s@ F11, ISO 100, 70-200mm f/2.8L IS, 78mm (124mm equiv)
PS CS2 Daylight, Exp0.35, USM 10:50
